ArticleInfo.ArticleSubTitle: Report of a case, with observations on the fluorescent anti-herpes simplex antibody reaction

ArticleNote.SimplePara: With 16 Figures in the Text (2 in Color)

This investigation was supported in part by Public Health Service Research Grant B 1230, and in part by a Special Fellowship (BT-623) to Dr.Davis, both from the National Institute of Neurological Diseases and Blindness, National Institutes of Health, Bethesda 14, Maryland.
